sentences.sentence: Aerial photography has revolutionized the study of archaeology.
sentences.translation: 航空摄影已经给考古学研究带来了一场革命。

sentences.sentence: A distinction must be made between archaeology proper and science-based archaeology.
sentences.translation: 必须对严格意义上的考古学和以科学为基础的考古学加以区分。

sentences.sentence: Michel Foucault (1972), The Archaeology of Knowledge; hereafter this text will be abbreviated as AK.
sentences.translation: 米歇尔•福柯（1972），《知识考古学》，下文简称AK。
